roleset.name: breathe heavily
roleset.note: PANT-V NOTES: Based on Brown. Member of VNcls hiccup-40.1.1. (from pant.01-v)
PANT-N NOTES: Based on verb entry pant.01. Corresponds to VerbNet entry 40.1.1. Framed by Claire. (from pant.01-n)

example.name: straight
example.text: It sometimes ended in death-like trances with many-1 lying [*-1] exhausted and panting on chair and floor.

example.name: with cause
example.text: We-1 ran east for about half a mile before we turned back to the road, [*-1] panting from the effort and soaked with sweat.

example.name: with purpose
example.text: Mickey found himself leaning against the desk, with stiff hands, panting for breath.

example.name: with manner
example.text: Watson-1 pounded to the crawling man and stopped, [*-1] panting heavily.

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: Cassio utters the fervent prayer that Othello might Make love 's quick pants in Desdemona 's arms .

example.name: Arg0 only
example.text: I found his panting very disturbing , he definitely needs more therapy or a better Doctor.

roleset.name: speak pantingly
roleset.note: PANT-V NOTES: Member of VNcls manner_speakiing-37.3. (from pant.02-v)

example.name: I'll huff and I'll puff...
example.text: ``[No telling how good this horse is]-2'', Mike panted [*T*-2].
